statements: DELETE FROM payment_reports WHERE user_id = 1234 AND payment_amount > 100.00
DELETE FROM payment_reports WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' AND payment_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM payment_reports WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics')
DELETE FROM payment_trends WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND amount >= 100.00;
DELETE FROM user_spending WHERE total_spent <= 500.00 AND loyalty_points < 100;
DELETE FROM payment_trends WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM transaction_date) < 2022;
DELETE FROM payment_trends WHERE user_id = 123 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM payment_reports WHERE payment_amount > 1000 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_spending WHERE total_spent < 500 AND last_purchase_date < '2022-02-28';
DELETE FROM product_sales WHERE total_sales <= 10 AND price > 50.00;
DELETE FROM user_spending WHERE user_id = 100 AND total_spent < 500;
DELETE FROM product_popularity WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND purchase_count < 10;
